name: Funk Unplugged
description: Funk Unplugged is a 3D Platformer where you can use your musical powers and platforming abilities to save the world!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: I5 2.4GHz processor Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia 970 or equivalent graphics Storage: 10 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: I5 2.6ghz Processor Memory: 12 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia 1060 or better or equivalent card Storage: 10 GB available space
